trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Resources" /> namespace provides classes and interfaces that allow developers to create, store, and manage various culture-specific resources used in an application.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Resources" /> fornece classes e interfaces que permitem aos desenvolvedores criar, armazenar e gerenciar vários recursos específicos de cultura usados em um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: One of the most important classes of the <see cref="N:System.Resources" /> namespace is the <see cref="T:System.Resources.ResourceManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma das classes mais importantes do namespace <see cref="N:System.Resources" /> é a classe <see cref="T:System.Resources.ResourceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> class allows the user to access and control resources stored in the main assembly or in resource satellite assemblies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> classe permite que o usuário a recursos de controle de acesso e armazenado no assembly principal ou em assemblies de satélite de recursos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A> and <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A> methods to retrieve culture-specific objects and strings.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A> e <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A> métodos para recuperar objetos específicos de cultura e cadeias de caracteres.
